title: [Large-scale] Foundations of Ontology-based Intelligent Instructional System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory concepts and understanding of social domains
context.additional_context: Students participate in in-class collaboration and knowledge structuring using personal devices, solving real educational design problems through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Educational content can be expressed in a hierarchical structure by utilizing ontology concepts
A procedure can be designed to evaluate the suitability of instructional methods by applying set-theoretic reasoning
A knowledge representation model for social domain topics can be prototyped and errors can be diagnosed
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
